subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: When the Rays hosted the Yankees on opening weekend, the Tampa Bay manager Joe Maddon aggressively shifted fielders, frustrating visiting hitters with a strategy that is unorthodox but successful.
snippet: When the Rays hosted the Yankees on opening weekend, the Tampa Bay manager Joe Maddon aggressively shifted fielders, frustrating visiting hitters with a strategy that is unorthodox but successful.
